bug.author: FrixosTh
bug.summary: [BUG] AircrackOnly plugin fails to load at startup
bug.description:
Describe the bug AircrackOnly plugin fails to load at startup due to unnecessary/wrong implementation of the super method call. To Reproduce
Update to version 1.2.1 Start Pwnagotchi Review the logs Identify error message
Expected behavior Expected AircrackOnly plugin to load correctly Screenshots If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Environment (please complete the following information):
Pwnagotchi version 1.2.1 OS version Type of hardware RPi0W Any additional hardware used
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
